comments:
3.3 M4

- ran a PDE JUnit launch config
- it ran to completion
- ran an eclipse OSGI launch config
- noticed that the Console view's content description still showed the first launch config (its content pane correctly showed the latter's console)
- to try to get it to refresh, I selected the only other console in the drop-down: Java Stack Trace Console
- the content description correctly updated to show "Java Stack Trace Console"
- switched back to the other console in the drop-down
- content description still showed "Java Stack Trace Console"
*** Bug 172976 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
I am unable to reproduce this problem using the latest build or 3.3M4
After restarting my host eclipse, I'm not seeing this anymore.

I'm seeing this again.  See attached screen shot.  The console drop-down is showing the selected console correctly, but the content description indicates Java Stack Trace Console.  

The steps were similar to the above, but I already had the "Target" launch config running before I ran the JUnit Plug-in Test launch config (to create the test db) and the "Embedded Jetty" launch config (an OSGi Framework launch config).

Created an attachment (id=58853)
Screen shot of console

The NPE has been fixed in bug bug 173714. This was also reported in bug 175369, which I will now mark as a dup of this bug. It could be that the fix to the NPE will address this problem.
*** Bug 175369 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
Nick/Jared - have you seen this in M6?
We're only at the stage of building and running our targets on M6. We're not yet selfhosting on it.
Marking as works for me. Please re-open if still a problem in M6/M7.
